MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the PA1 postcode area of Paisley. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:50am to transfer properties onto a separate part of the network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:28am on Tuesday, 23 March 2021
